job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Job Description: </strong></p><p><strong>Production Support / Application Support, Linux / Windows / SQL – Expert ;</strong></p><p><strong><span class="ql-cursor"></span></strong></p><p><strong>Desired Skills:</strong></p><p>SQL experts in Unix/Linux Production Support profiles.&nbsp;SQL is the main deciding factor</p><ul><li>Unix – 8/10</li><li>Windows – How to login, IIS, Services, Security policy, Computer management – 8/10</li><li>SQL – Strong knowledge (Writing queries, Stored procedure trouble-shooting, Statistics, DDL, DML knowledge, transact-SQL, Oracle) – 9/10</li><li>Monitoring – 8/10</li><li>Analytical – Needs to understand production issue scenarios and approach to engage and resolve – 8/10</li><li>Communication – 8/10</li></ul><p><strong>&nbsp;</strong></p><p><strong>Good to have:</strong></p><ul><li>Scheduling tools – 7/10</li><li>Security Certificate Management – 7/10</li><li>SFTP, SSH protocol – 7/10</li><li>Linux –Advanced</li><li>SQL – Advanced</li><li>Windows – Advanced</li><li>Scripting (such as Shell/Perl or PowerShell)</li><li>Knowledge of production application environments and components including database design and performance (such as Oracle, MS SQL); virtual servers (such as VMWare); monitoring platforms (such as Geneos); application resiliency automation; scheduling tools (such as Autosys); load balancing (such as DR pairs, CNAMES, A-Record); transmission protocols (such as SFTP, NDM); Messaging tools (such as MQ, KAFKA)</li><li>BS or MS in Computer Science highly desired</li><li>Service Now – a plus</li><li>Investment Banking Financial Services (such as institutional markets, post trade technology, prime brokerage and fund services) a plus.</li></ul>
